FAQ / Alpha Trion Protocols / Wave 3 / Battle Cards /

Valiant Effort

  1. CUSTOM CARD
    If I have a Leader on my team, who can I give the +3 ATK to?     [Source: Alpha Trion Protocols]
    You can only give one of your Leader characters the +3 ATK. If you have multiple Leaders, you can choose between them to receive this bonus.
  2. CUSTOM CARD
    Can I play this card if I have no Leaders on my team?     [Source: Alpha Trion Protocols]
    Yes. You would only get the second ability then, as long as you have a Ranged character.
  3. CUSTOM CARD
    Can I play this card if I have no Ranged characters on my team?     [Source: Alpha Trion Protocols]
    Yes. You would only get the first ability then, as long as you have a Leader character.
  4. CUSTOM CARD
    If I have both a Leader and a Ranged character on my team, do I get both effects?     [Source: Alpha Trion Protocols]
    Yes. The card does not ask you to choose.
  5. CUSTOM CARD
    Can I play this card if I have neither a Leader, nor a Ranged character on my team?     [Source: Alpha Trion Protocols]
    Yes, but it would do nothing.
